params.name: target_sizes
params.description: List of length (batch_size), where each list item (Tuple[int, int]) corresponds to the requestedfinal size (height, width) of each prediction. If left to None, predictions will not be resized.

params.name: num_labels
params.description: Number of classes in the segmentation task (excluding the background). If specified, a palette will bebuilt, assuming that class_idx 0 is the background, to map prediction masks from RGB values to classindices. This value should be the same used when preprocessing inputs.
